description: Pre-compiled XMLSchema-instance namespace grammar with standard xsi attributes

type.name: type
type.description: Specifies the type of an element when xsi:type differs from the declared type

nil.name: nil
nil.description: Indicates that an element is nil (null)

schemaLocation.name: schemaLocation
schemaLocation.description: Provides hints for schema locations as namespace URI and schema location pairs

noNamespaceSchemaLocation.name: noNamespaceSchemaLocation
noNamespaceSchemaLocation.description: Provides hints for schema location for elements in no namespace
